spawnpoint.name: Spawnpoint

girl.name: Amelia
girl.text: "Hey there! My name's Amelia! I see you're another newcomer, if you want to find anyone else, I'd advise that you go check out the town up north. Oh! If you ever need to be healed, I've heard there's a magic fountain around here somewhere... It's a dangerous world out there. See ya!"

spawnpoint.text: You arrive at the world spawnpoint. It's a well-forested area, and the ground is scattered with rocks and leaves. On a particularly large bolder, a little girl is sitting and looking at the trees. ("talk girl") To the north, you see a small town area, and to the east you see a dirt trail leading into the trees. To the south, you see a snowy area to which a trail of small, tri-pointed tracks lead. To the west, you see a soaring cliff flocked by pigeons.

tundra.name: Tundra
tundra.text: You walk to the precipice of the snow. The change in temperature is immediate and unnatural, you know you can't pass without some form of higher insulation. Farther to the south, sat in the middle of the snow is an odd building surrounded by unidenifiable figures. Back to the north, you can see the spawnpoint, and to the west, you see a fountain.

cliffside.name: Cliffside
cliffside.text: You walk to the bottom of the cliff. It soars higher now than you could have noticed before; easily over a hundred feet up. The pigeons look at you tauntingly, but you know you will require more than your bare hands to scale the cliff. Farther to the west, on top of the cliff, you see a strange building. Back to the east, you can see the spawnpoint, to the south, you see a fountain, and to the north, you can see what looks like a mineshaft.

fountain.name: Glowing Fountain

squirrel.name: Bizarre Squirrel
squirrel.text: [The squirrel doesn't speak, of course, but you look into its eyes and understand the IT is the source of healing the people speak of, and it will heal you too, for a price. ("heal")]

fountain.text: You walk into an opening in the trees and in the middle is a hill with a gorgeous marble fountain atop it. It looks centuries old, but has somehow remained untarnished, despite being in the only exposed spot in the forest. You immediately understand that it must be magic, to be so beautiful in the face of adveristy. At that very moment, an unusually large squirrel crawls around the side of the fountain and looks at you. It has an exeptionally long tounge, a queer grin, and an equally odd gaze. ("talk squirrel") To the north, you can see the cliffside, and to the east, you can make out the tundra.

town.name: Town Center

merchant.name: Strange Merchant
merchant.text:
"Welcome to my shoppe! Here you can purchase from my endless stock of seemingly random products, ha!"
Wares:

SuperPick - $1000

(Use "inspect {item}" or "buy {item}")

superpick.name: SuperPick
superpick.description: The newest SuperPick model, even though it's not yet released? Grants 35% faster mining speed.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: A small, shiny dagger. Increases attack damage by 5.

governor.name: Governor Humdrum
governor.text: "Hello there, commoner. I'm the Governor of prospect town, named for its abundance in gold, and more importantly, prospectors! (Of course, we haven't had much busniness since the great bird war started.)"

prospector.name: Gold Prospector
prospector.text: "Well howdy, kid. If yer lookin' to make a few dimes, I'd suggest you head on over to the gold mines. It don't pay all that well, but I reckon it's better than any other job that silly governor will put you up to."

town.text: You walk to the center of the town and look around. In a corner stands a skinny man with strange eyes and a small table of wares, attached to which is a sign that proclaims it to be a "Shoppe". ("talk merchant") In the center of the square, a man in a tweed suit and tophat is standing by himself. ("talk governor") Back to the south, you can see the spawnpoint, and to the west, you see what looks like a mineshaft. A man with a pickaxe and candle with a reflector strapped to his forehead is standing by the entrance trail to the mineshaft. ("talk prospector")

mine.name: Gold Mine

prospector.name: Gold Prospector
prospector.text: "Hey there, welcome to the gold mine! To start mining, use the command "mine". You'll find yerself some gold sure 'nuff. If you do, bring it to me and I'll take it off yer hands in exchange fer some dough."

mine.text: You walk into the mine's opening, and find a large interior hewn from the rock. Another prospector stands by a torch on one of the support structures. ("talk prospector") Back to the east is the town, and to the south is the cliffside.

trail.name: Beaten Trail
trail.text: You walk along the trail. To the west is the spawnpoint, and the trail continues to the east.

trailTwo.name: Beaten Trail
trailTwo.text: You continue on the trail. It goes on to the east, and westward, towards the world spawnpoint.
